name: Minimalist Art Club
description:
Minimalist Art Club is a short game about joining a club, finding soda, determining rank by hat size, and proper fish tank maintenance.

This game is very short, but has two endings. Seriously its five minutes long.

But is has some mildly lame humor and a mermaid, so check it out!

Made for the Jamingtons 5.0 Game Jam.
